attributes.review: Do NOT download this app, it glitches all the time and it will make your phone slower. Worst app ever! The design and preface are also hideous! Nothing good to look at, the performance is ugly and it doesn’t work at all.
attributes.title: SO BAD

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and within minutes nothing worked on it. I had to get a new phone just to leave this review.
attributes.title: Broke my phone

attributes.review: This app scammed my T-rex and killed my hamster! This app also took 69,000,000 dollars from my bank account and bought minecoins (Minecraft currency) with it!!!  Never should’ve gotten this HORRIBLE APP! It also turned my phone wallpaper to an orange!!! EW!
attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I mean I knew pests come around during the summer but imagine one coming in 2016 and staying for four years...yuck!!! Anyways app do be moving kinda slow tho, very finicky.
attributes.title: Too many bugs

attributes.review: when i first downloaded the app i opened it up to see a horrifying image (i will boy explain because it was far too disturbing) i then continued to explore the app and was exposed to some horrifying videos of a cheeto hiding in a bunker and in all honesty this app made me consider moving to north korea because i would be better off there after experiencing what i did on our presidents app
attributes.title: made me want to move to north korea...

attributes.review: Today I downloaded this app hoping to get to see our pretty president of the Americas. Instead I saw this nasty racist Cheeto. This app is very disappointing and absolutely not worth your time🧚🏻‍♂️✨✨ next caller pls🥵
attributes.title: Not worth your time

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my front teeth fell out, my hair turned blonde, and I started saying “All Lives Matter!” 😱 Would give 0 stars if I could. Cannot recommend it at all.
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: Why does the big bad Cheeto man want all my information?  What will he do with it?!  Hold on I hear something at my door...is that...could it be?...fresh orange juice being squeezed into the eyes of innocent children???!!!😳😳😳
attributes.title: He🦧has💕no🙈lips🤢how🧃will🐀he🥀get🦦a kiss kiss👄

attributes.review: Very very big virus that looks like orange Cheeto installed. Phone broken had to buy new iPhone X super max plus because of horrible app. (It is okay because I rich) Very offensive. My feeling and phone are hurt. I thought you were nice mr trump sir
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: this app did not meet my expectations. i saw sooo many disturbing things on this it disgusted me. i almost had to put bleach on my eyes bc of what i saw😔. i don’t recommend wasting time or storage to get this app. ✨no✨
